citation.title: Risk for Transportation of 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) from Wuhan to Cities in China

news.title: Coronavirus: Was bringt das Screening?
news.summary: Schwer fassbar: Die Ausbreitung des Coronavirus lässt sich durch Maßnahmen wie Fiebermessen und die Befragung aller Reisenden wahrscheinlich kaum eindämmen, wie neue Studien nahelegen.

news.title: Was tun gegen die Ausbreitung des Coronavirus? - wissenschaft.de
news.summary: Weltweit versuchen Gesundheitsbehörden, die Ausbreitung des neuen Coronavirus einzudämmen – mit bisher nur geringem Erfolg.

news.title: Coronavirus likely spread beyond quarantine borders before China's ‘lockdown’ was in place
news.summary: China’s deadly coronavirus likely spread beyond existing quarantined areas before the “lockdown” was put in place, research suggests.

news.title: Travel Bans and Quarantines Won't Stop Coronavirus
news.summary: The US announced travel restrictions on Friday. But some public health experts worry that a ban won't work—and could create new problems.

news.title: Coronavirus likely spread beyond quarantine borders before China’s ‘lockdown’ was in place
news.summary: 07-Feb-2020 Intellasia | Yahoo Style UK | 6:02 AM China’s deadly coronavirus likely spread beyond existing quarantined areas before the “lockdown” was put in place, research suggests.

news.title: Border control measures insufficient to contain spread of COVID-19
news.summary: By Amelia Nichele Two new studies suggest the importance of using a suite of containment measures to stop the spread of COVID-19, ranging from border control to school closures.

news.title: The Pandemic Is Pushing Scientists To Rethink How They Read Research Papers
news.summary: The coronavirus pandemic has posed a special challenge for scientists: Figuring out how to make sense of a flood of scientific papers from labs and scientists unfamiliar to them.
